dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new opportunities with caution, carefully weighing pros and cons before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will take calculated risks, viewing uncertainty as an opportunity for growth and exploration.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Financial Focus
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize financial goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize high-risk, high-reward investments and financial strategies to maximize returns.
Your FarTwin will focus on stable, long-term investments and financial strategies to maintain a secure financial foundation.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and information using logical, systematic methods to arrive at a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts, experiences, and emotional intelligence to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Relationship Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form and maintain relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will value their independence and freedom, maintaining a balance between alone time and social connections.
Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong, meaningful relationships with others, seeking support and connection in return.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize productivity, focusing on completing tasks quickly and effectively to maximize output.
Your FarTwin will take a relaxed approach to time management, allowing for flexibility and spontaneity in their daily schedule.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, encouraging others to do the same in return.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with those they trust or feel comfortable with.

dimensions.label: Risk Perception
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin perceive risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will view risk as an unavoidable aspect of life, taking calculated steps to mitigate its impact.
Your FarTwin will generally avoid risk, prioritizing stability and security in their personal and professional endeavors.
